sentences.sContent: There is still a stigma attached to cancer.
sentences.sCn: 癌症仍被人看作是一种见不得人的事。

remMethod.val: stig(刺) + ma → 留在名声上的刺 → 污点， 耻辱

words.tran: 有烙印的；丑恶的；不名誉的；气孔的；小红斑的

trans.tranCn: 污点， 耻辱； 烙印； 特征
trans.tranOther: If something has a stigma attached to it, people think it is something to be ashamed of
